name: park-ball
effect: Used by a trainer in battle : Catches a wild Pokémon. This item can only be used in pal park.
short_effect: Catches Pokémon in the Pal Park every time.

flavor_text.sun_moon: A special Poké Ball for the Pal Park.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: A special Poké Ball for the Pal Park.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: A special Poké Ball for the Pal Park.
